title: Provides for hazardous materials emergency response training for emergency medical services personnel of a fire department of N.Y. city
summary: Provides for hazardous materials emergency response training for emergency medical services personnel of a fire department of a city of one million or more, by the state department of health and the state fire administrator.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to the provision of hazardous materials emergency response training to emergency medical services personnel employed by a fire department operating within a city with a population of more than one million
